28 #ifndef _BGPDUMP_ATTR_H
29 #define _BGPDUMP_ATTR_H
30 
31 #include <sys/types.h>
32 #include <netinet/in.h>
33 
34 /* BGP Attribute flags. */
35 #define BGP_ATTR_FLAG_OPTIONAL 0x80 /* Attribute is optional. */
36 #define BGP_ATTR_FLAG_TRANS 0x40 /* Attribute is transitive. */
37 #define BGP_ATTR_FLAG_PARTIAL 0x20 /* Attribute is partial. */
38 #define BGP_ATTR_FLAG_EXTLEN 0x10 /* Extended length flag. */
39 
40 /* BGP attribute type codes. */
41 #define BGP_ATTR_ORIGIN 1
42 #define BGP_ATTR_AS_PATH 2
43 #define BGP_ATTR_NEXT_HOP 3
44 #define BGP_ATTR_MULTI_EXIT_DISC 4
45 #define BGP_ATTR_LOCAL_PREF 5
46 #define BGP_ATTR_ATOMIC_AGGREGATE 6
47 #define BGP_ATTR_AGGREGATOR 7
48 #define BGP_ATTR_COMMUNITIES 8
49 #define BGP_ATTR_ORIGINATOR_ID 9
50 #define BGP_ATTR_CLUSTER_LIST 10
51 #define BGP_ATTR_DPA 11
52 #define BGP_ATTR_ADVERTISER 12
53 #define BGP_ATTR_RCID_PATH 13
54 #define BGP_ATTR_MP_REACH_NLRI 14
55 #define BGP_ATTR_MP_UNREACH_NLRI 15
56 #define BGP_ATTR_EXT_COMMUNITIES 16
57 #define BGP_ATTR_NEW_AS_PATH 17
58 #define BGP_ATTR_NEW_AGGREGATOR 18
59 
60 /* Flag macro */
61 #define ATTR_FLAG_BIT(X) (1 << ((X) - 1))
62 
63 /* BGP ASPATH attribute defines */
64 #define AS_HEADER_SIZE 2
65 
66 #define AS_SET 1
67 #define AS_SEQUENCE 2
68 #define AS_CONFED_SEQUENCE 3
69 #define AS_CONFED_SET 4
70 
71 #define AS_SEG_START 0
72 #define AS_SEG_END 1
73 
74 #define ASPATH_STR_DEFAULT_LEN 32
75 #define ASPATH_STR_ERROR "! Error !"
76 
77 /* BGP COMMUNITY attribute defines */
78 
79 #define COMMUNITY_NO_EXPORT 0xFFFFFF01
80 #define COMMUNITY_NO_ADVERTISE 0xFFFFFF02
81 #define COMMUNITY_NO_EXPORT_SUBCONFED 0xFFFFFF03
82 #define COMMUNITY_LOCAL_AS 0xFFFFFF03
83 
84 #define com_nthval(X,n) ((X)->val + (n))
85 
86 /* MP-BGP address families */
87 #define AFI_IP 1
88 #define AFI_IP6 2
89 #define BGPDUMP_MAX_AFI AFI_IP6
90 
91 #define SAFI_UNICAST 1
92 #define SAFI_MULTICAST 2
93 #define SAFI_UNICAST_MULTICAST 3
94 #define BGPDUMP_MAX_SAFI SAFI_UNICAST_MULTICAST
95 
96 struct unknown_attr
97 {
98  int flag;
99  int type;
100  int len;
101  u_char *raw;
102 };
103 
104 typedef u_int32_t as_t;
105 
106 typedef struct attr attributes_t;
107 struct attr
108 {
109  /* Flag of attribute is set or not. */
110  u_int32_t flag;
111 
112  /* Attributes. */
113  int origin;
114  struct in_addr nexthop;
115  u_int32_t med;
116  u_int32_t local_pref;
117  as_t aggregator_as;
118  struct in_addr aggregator_addr;
119  u_int32_t weight;
120  struct in_addr originator_id;
121  struct cluster_list *cluster;
122 
123  struct aspath *aspath;
124  struct community *community;
125  struct ecommunity *ecommunity;
126  struct transit *transit;
127 
128  /* libbgpdump additions */
129 
130  struct mp_info *mp_info;
131  u_int16_t len;
132  caddr_t data;
133 
134  u_int16_t unknown_num;
135  struct unknown_attr *unknown;
136 
137  /* ASN32 support */
138  struct aspath *new_aspath;
139  struct aspath *old_aspath;
140  as_t new_aggregator_as;
141  as_t old_aggregator_as;
142  struct in_addr new_aggregator_addr;
143  struct in_addr old_aggregator_addr;
144 };
145 
146 struct community
147 {
148  int size;
149  u_int32_t *val;
150  char *str;
151 };
152 
153 struct cluster_list
154 {
155  int length;
156  struct in_addr *list;
157 };
158 
159 struct transit
160 {
161  int length;
162  u_char *val;
163 };
164 
165 struct aspath
166 {
167  u_int8_t asn_len;
168  int length;
169  int count;
170  caddr_t data;
171  char *str;
172 };
173 
174 struct assegment
175 {
176  u_char type;
177  u_char length;
178  char data[0];
179 };
180 
181 struct mp_info {
182  /* AFI and SAFI start from 1, so the arrays must be 1-based */
183  struct mp_nlri *withdraw[BGPDUMP_MAX_AFI+1][BGPDUMP_MAX_SAFI+1];
184  struct mp_nlri *announce[BGPDUMP_MAX_AFI+1][BGPDUMP_MAX_SAFI+1];
185 };
186 
187 #define MP_IPV6_ANNOUNCE(m) ((m)->announce[AFI_IP6][SAFI_UNICAST])
188 #define MP_IPV6_WITHDRAW(m) ((m)->withdraw[AFI_IP6][SAFI_UNICAST])
189 
190 typedef union union_BGPDUMP_IP_ADDRESS {
191  struct in_addr v4_addr;
192  struct in6_addr v6_addr;
193 } BGPDUMP_IP_ADDRESS;
194 
195 
196 #define BGPDUMP_ADDRSTRLEN 46
197 
198 #define ASN16_LEN sizeof(u_int16_t)
199 #define ASN32_LEN sizeof(u_int32_t)
200 
201 #define AS_TRAN 23456
202 
203 struct prefix {
204  BGPDUMP_IP_ADDRESS address;
205  u_char len;
206 };
207 
208 #define MAX_PREFIXES 2000
209 struct mp_nlri {
210  u_char nexthop_len;
211 
212  BGPDUMP_IP_ADDRESS nexthop;
213  BGPDUMP_IP_ADDRESS nexthop_local;
214 
215  u_int16_t prefix_count;
216  struct prefix nlri[MAX_PREFIXES];
217 };
218 
219 #endif /* _BGPDUMP_ATTR_H */
